greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: INVERTi transform of A006973
comment: A156792 = a convolution triangle: A006973 convolved with A156791.
example: The sequence begins (1, 1,...); then for all further a(n), write (n-1) terms of A006973 backwards. Take the dot of the latter and the first (n-1) terms of A156791. Subtract from the next term of A006973.
results.author: _Gary W. Adamson_, Feb 15 2009
